translations: v.面对；对抗（confront 的 ing 形式）；对立

sentences.sentence: It was conflicted between confronting the object and eating the food, so instead, it just fell asleep.
sentences.translation: 它在面对这个物体和吃掉食物之间感到矛盾，所以它干脆睡觉了。

sentences.sentence: Human societies have the power to solve the problems confronting them.
sentences.translation: 人类社会有能力解决他们面临的问题。

sentences.sentence: You may find your temper on a short fuse when confronting your teenager.
sentences.translation: 对付十几岁的半大孩子，你可能动不动就会生气。
